label: Oracle Database 12.1.0.2 Standard Edition
summary: Oracle Database 12c Standard Edition is an affordable, full-featured data management solution that is ideal for midsize companies.
description:
Oracle Database 12c Standard Edition is an affordable, full-featured data management solution that is ideal for midsize companies.

This image is a Bring-Your-Own-License image that assumes you have already procured the appropriate licenses with Oracle and are properly licensed to run this image in Microsoft Azure.
